welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yattir, a charming city nestled in the West Bank known for its rich history and breathtaking landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nevatim AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Nevatim AFB Airport, used for military and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beer Sheba Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beer Sheba Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
